description:
Forget about cold hands on the track or the trail. The Wind Block Gloves are made from premium 3-layer softshell fabric for weather protection and a soft, fleecy liner to stave off chills. Deploy the integrated overmitt for extra warmth when the temperature takes a plunge.

  • 3-layer softshell with Dry-Tex waterproof membrane keep hands warm and dry
  • 100g of Clomax® synthetic insulation keeps chilly winds at bay
  • Brushed polyester tricot fleece liner is soft and cozy against the skin
  • Durable synthetic leather palm provides good grip
  • Deployable finger mitt tucks into the dedicated pocket in the back of hand
  • Touchscreen-compatible fingertips let you use your smartphone without getting cold fingers
  • Reflective details add visibility as the days get shorter
name: MEC T2 Warmer Wind Block Gloves - Unisex
